title: aulddubliner.com
content:
Hello all,

Can anyone tell me what fonts were used for the Auld Dubliner logo at aulddubliner.com?

Thanks in advance.

 [‹ font converse / chuck taylor](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151524/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43797 "Go to previous forum topic") [brazillian book publisher's logo font id ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151524/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43821 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content:
Hi Misa,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151524im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/auld_5904.png)
  
 [Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/uncial/), [Neue Hammer Unziale](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151524/http:/www.linotype.com/de/1265/neuehammerunziale-schriftfamilie.html) and [American Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/american-uncial/familytree.html) all are pretty close.

I found out the font could be “Gaeilge2,” but I don’t know where to get it.  
Does anyone know where to go?

Thanks!
